home_preferences.ideal_family: Homes where kittens get plenty of love, play, and companionship.
home_preferences.ideal_environment: Mostly indoors, but they’ll enjoy safe outside adventures when possible.
outdoor_options: A catio or enclosed patio if you have one
A backyard with supervision (or recall training), or short leash/harness outings
GPS or smart collars (Tractive, Whistle, Pawfit, etc.) (great for peace of mind when you are comfortable with them roaming
Or any other creative arrangement that feels right for both safety and joy
safety_notes: Use common sense to find the sweet spot between keeping them safe and keeping them happy.

policies.not_breeders_note: Family cat’s litter—we’re just rehoming responsibly.
